item.name: Battery charge %
item.description: The remaining battery capacity expressed in percent of full capacity

item.name: Battery temperature
item.description: The current internal UPS temperature expressed in Celsius

item.name: Battery voltage
item.description: The actual battery bus voltage in Volts

item.name: Device manufactured
item.description: The date when the UPS was manufactured

item.name: Input frequency
item.description: The current input frequency on the Main Input to the UPS system in 0.1Hz

item.name: Input voltage (Phase-1)
item.description: The input voltage in VAC, L12

item.name: Input voltage (Phase-2)
item.description: The input voltage in VAC, L23

item.name: Input voltage (Phase-3)
item.description: The input voltage in VAC, L31

item.name: Output current (Phase-1)
item.description: The output current in 0.1 amperes drawn by the load on the UPS, or -1 if it's unsupported by this UPS.

item.name: Output current (Phase-2)
item.description: The output current in 0.1 amperes drawn by the load on the UPS, or -1 if it's unsupported by this UPS.

item.name: Output current (Phase-3)
item.description: The output current in 0.1 amperes drawn by the load on the UPS, or -1 if it's unsupported by this UPS.

item.name: Output frequency
item.description: The current output frequency of the UPS system in tenths of Hz

item.name: Output load %
item.description: The current UPS load expressed in percent of rated capacity

item.name: Output load (Phase-1)
item.description: The output load in VA, or -1 if it's unsupported by this UPS

item.name: Output load (Phase-2)
item.description: The output load in VA, or -1 if it's unsupported by this UPS

item.name: Output load (Phase-3)
item.description: The output load in VA, or -1 if it's unsupported by this UPS

item.name: Output power
item.description: The total output active power of the UPS system in W. The total active power is the sum of phase 1, phase 2 and phase 3 power

item.name: Output power (Phase-1)
item.description: The output power in Watts

item.name: Output power (Phase-2)
item.description: The output power in Watts

item.name: Output power (Phase-3)
item.description: The output power in Watts
